item.title: Showcasing VISPECT at the Daimler India Commercial Vehicles Quality Summit
item.description:
Showcasing VISPECT at the Daimler India Commercial Vehicles Quality Summit

At AICUE DATA LAB, we recently had the opportunity to showcase our product VISPECT ‚Äî Visual Inspection with AI (using just a mobile) at the DICV Quality Summit.

Over the course of the event, more than 50 visitors from various functions stopped by our stall to learn how VISPECT can help transform traditional visual inspection into a digital, data-driven process.

item.title: The Future of Dealerships: AI-Driven Observability Across Every Bay
item.description:
For decades, dealership efficiency was measured by the number of bays, the size of the team, or the hours per job.
Today, a new metric is emerging ‚Äî observability.

Dealerships that see everything in real time are outpacing those that rely on manual tracking or end-of-day summaries.
AI-driven observability is no longer futuristic; it‚Äôs quietly becoming the foundation of how modern workshops run.

The New Standard of Awareness

With Platemate AI capturing vehicle movements and AIDeal interpreting patterns, every step of the service journey becomes visible:

item.title: From Data to Decisions: How AIDeal Helps Dealers Plan Smarter
item.description:
Most dealerships are flooded with data ‚Äî job cards, CCTV footage, service records, billing logs.
But few can see what that data is really saying.

AIDeal was built to bridge that gap.
It transforms the constant flow of service data into clear, predictive insights that help dealers plan better, allocate resources efficiently, and stay ahead of bottlenecks.

From Reporting to Foresight

Traditional reporting tells you what happened.
AIDeal goes further ‚Äî it tells you what‚Äôs about to happen.

item.title: Real-Time Alerts That Reach the People Who Can Act
item.description:
Safety isn‚Äôt just about reporting ‚Äî it‚Äôs about responding.
AISee sends instant alerts with images to the actual operating staff via WhatsApp or the mobile app.
If someone misses a helmet or enters a restricted zone, supervisors know immediately ‚Äî with a visual alert they can act on.

This closes the gap between observation and action.
No waiting for reports. No missed incidents.
Just timely information that helps people fix issues right where they happen.

item.title: Small Fixes, Big Gains: How Real-Time Alerts Prevent Service Bay Bottlenecks
item.description:
In a busy dealership, it‚Äôs rarely the big problems that slow things down.
It‚Äôs the small, silent ones ‚Äî a delayed billing, an electrician tied up, a vehicle waiting for approval.

Individually, they seem minor. But together, they create the familiar picture of full bays, idle technicians, and missed delivery targets.

The good news? Those issues can be caught early ‚Äî with real-time AI alerts.

The Power of Instant Awareness

When a vehicle crosses the 24-hour threshold, or when completed cars remain on-site too long, a simple email alert from AIDeal and Platemate AI can make all the difference.

item.title: Audit Readiness Made Simple ‚Äî Show Numbers, Not Narratives
item.description:
Audits often come down to one big question: Can you demonstrate improvement?
Most shop floors struggle here ‚Äî safety logs are inconsistent, and human observation is unreliable over long periods.

AISee changes that.
Every deviation is logged automatically, along with time-stamped images and compliance percentages.
When an auditor asks, you don‚Äôt show manual registers ‚Äî you show data, charts, and trends.

Benefits

  • Real-time, quantitative evidence for safety compliance
  • Automatic monthly and quarterly summaries
  • Visual proof of CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Actions) effectiveness

AISee gives you the ability to say with confidence:

item.title: 24-Hour Turnaround: Why Visibility Is the New Efficiency Metric
item.description:
Every dealership wants faster turnaround ‚Äî but not every dealership knows where the time goes.

In today‚Äôs service operations, efficiency isn‚Äôt just about tools or technicians. It‚Äôs about visibility.
The moment you can see every vehicle‚Äôs journey from entry to exit, you start to notice the invisible losses ‚Äî waiting, delays, and idle bays.

That‚Äôs why forward-thinking dealerships are now using visibility itself as the key performance metric.

The Visibility Gap

Most workshops still rely on manual updates, whiteboards, or service advisors to track progress.
But as vehicle volumes increase, so does complexity.
A few untracked cars quickly snowball into hours of wasted bay time and missed same-day deliveries.

item.title: Turning Safety into Measurable Metrics with AISee
item.description:
For years, safety audits have relied on manual observations and checklists ‚Äî difficult to sustain and nearly impossible to measure objectively.
With AISee, shop floors now gain measurable, daily metrics for safety adherence using their existing CCTV feeds.

AISee‚Äôs Vision-AI technology automatically detects safety gear like helmets, jackets, and goggles, logs compliance by shift, and builds visual trend reports.
Supervisors and managers can see at a glance how safety compliance evolves over time ‚Äî by workstation, by shift, and by department.

item.title: Case Study: How a Dealership Improved Service Turnaround and Turnover by 10% Using AI
item.description:
When a leading multi-brand dealership started missing delivery commitments, it wasn‚Äôt because of poor technicians ‚Äî it was visibility. Vehicles were ready but still waiting. Bays stayed full, and same-day deliveries kept slipping.

That changed when the team implemented Platemate AI and AIDeal together. What followed was a 10% increase in service capacity ‚Äî without adding staff or a single extra bay.

The Challenge: Bottlenecks Hidden in Plain Sight

The dealership aimed for a 24-hour turnaround for all service jobs.
But once the vehicle entered the workshop, visibility vanished.
Cars were often completed but undelivered ‚Äî waiting for billing, approval, or a cashier.
No one knew exactly how long each vehicle had been on site.

item.title: From Cameras to Insights: How AI is Transforming Dealership Operations
item.description:
Most dealerships already have dozens of CCTV cameras quietly recording every moment ‚Äî vehicles arriving, bays filling, customers waiting.
What if those same cameras could tell you why a service bay is free, which vehicles are pending delivery, or how long a car has been waiting after completion?

That‚Äôs exactly what we set out to do with Platemate AI and AIDeal ‚Äî turning ordinary cameras into a real-time source of operational intelligence.

item.title: Voice of the Customer: Real Feedback on Vispect AI Visual Inspection
item.description:
At Vispect, we know real feedback from users is invaluable. Here‚Äôs the genuine, unedited voice of a plant quality head who implemented the Vispect AI visual inspection system in their factory:

‚ÄúMost important benefit Sir, No need for trained operator. New boy joined, in 3rd day he was doing inspection of assembly with more than 60 brackets. Big benefit.‚Äù

‚ÄúWe have other states contractors working, they said computer wont be better than us, why you want to use computer. 3 months ago I showed him(a senior contractor) the one failure that went to customer and we fixed it there, then I showed him that system had pointed it too! ‚Äì Now he will not move to paint shop without AI inspection.‚Äù

item.title: How a Tier 1 Supplier Cut Inspection Time by 95% Using VISPECT
item.description:
A Tier 1 Supplier’s Journey from 15-Minute Inspections to 45 Seconds

In the world of commercial vehicle manufacturing, quality assurance is non-negotiable. For one Tier 1 supplier specializing in fabrication and metal forming, ensuring precision across thousands of parts per month was a serious operational challenge.

Before VISPECT, their most complex part‚Äîrequiring five different views and 150 individual part identification checks‚Äîtook around 15 minutes to inspect manually. This created delays, fatigue, and inconsistencies across operators and shifts. Also, this was with an experienced operator, who could only inspect a limited number of parts per hour.

item.title: The AI Solution to Quality Control Crisis in Manufacturing SMEs
item.description:
The Future of Visual Inspection is Here

Imagine this: a new operator walks onto your factory floor and begins performing complex visual inspections with the precision of a seasoned quality engineer. This isn‚Äôt science fiction‚Äîit‚Äôs real, thanks to AI-powered visual inspection.

At AICUE Data Lab, we created VISPECT to address one of the most persistent challenges in manufacturing: maintaining consistent, high-quality inspection despite a shortage of skilled labor and increasing product complexity.

item.title: Why VISPECT is the Future of Smart Factory Inspection
item.description:
5 Reasons VISPECT is a Must-Have for Quality-Driven Manufacturers

1. üöÄ Dramatic Productivity Gains

Traditional Inspection

  • Takes 1‚Äì3 minutes per part
  • Varies by operator
  • Error-prone due to fatigue

VISPECT

  • Seconds per inspection
  • Consistent and fatigue-free
  • Uniform across shifts

2. üí∏ Cost Savings Through Deskilling

VISPECT decouples inspection skill from experience, so any operator can inspect like an expert.

Key Benefits:

  • Lower inspection labor costs
  • Faster onboarding
  • Greater staff flexibility
  • Reduced training needs
  • Handle low-volume or sporadic parts easily

3. üì± Flexibility with Mobile Quality Control

VISPECT works with any camera‚Äîeven smartphones‚Äîso inspections can be done anywhere:

Product announcements and updates

We are excited to announce several new AI products that are now available. Each product is designed to address specific needs in various industries, leveraging the latest advancements in artificial intelligence.

Vispect (2025)

Vispect is a cutting-edge AI solution designed for visual inspection in manufacturing. It enhances inspection effectiveness, reduces costs, and provides flexibility by deskilling operations. With cloud-based record maintenance and proven deployment across industries, Vispect ensures economical scalability for businesses of all sizes. Know more about Vispect here

item.title: CueStep - Domain Knowledge Served
item.description:
Domain Knowledge Served

  1. Interactive process/standards/policy documentation or learning content - Served from your portal or internal apps- Your LLM / ChatGPT
  2. Better access and convenience with chatbots (both web/mobile or whatsapp) automating repetitive queries.

Business is changing fast Fixed dashboards and reports aren't enough.

  • Chat with your Databases/ERP/CRM and get performance metrics for decisions - Your AI executive assistant.
  • Instant responses , Updated and Accurate

  1. Proven framework - Serving chat based on database for a large global supply chain company to more than 900 users over whatsapp - metrics, vehicle/delivery location in natural language

item.title: Vispect AI - Visual Inspection Using AI
item.description:
Visual Inspection using AI

  1. Improve Inspection Effectiveness with AI assisted inspection
  2. Increase flexibility with deskilling - No dedicated operators for specific parts. Deploy new staff easily with minimal training
  3. Cut inspection effort, time and costs
  4. Maintain records in cloud for audit and future customer request

Low investment - Economical at low volumes ... From SME to Tier 1 to OEMs

  • Range of volumes
    • Low volume production sometimes... at just 50 per month
    • Sporadic production - such as seasonal or defense products
    • High volume linked to conveyor line capture and inspection
  • Range of industry types
    • Range of industry - Automotive Tier 1, Sheet metal, Fabrication, Electrical, and more...
    • Scales with your business - Up and Down - Economical subscription that scales with your volume
    • Affordable for all segments as priced on per piece basis
  1. Proven solution - Deployed in 4 plants of a large Multi-OEM Tier-1 fabrication supplier
  2. Payback in less than 6 months[Conservative]
  3. Action oriented - Delivered at point of use(Inspection results on the mobile app itself) . Simple actionable - friendly reports
  4. No special IT investments - served off a secure cloud. No special training invesments

What Our Customers Say

Real feedback from companies that trust Vispect AI for their visual inspection needs

item.title: About AICUE DATA LAB - Enabling manufacuring companies with AI for business results
item.description:
Vision

Enable decision making with data science to ensure business results and bring easy to use products to all front liners

Founded in 2020, we work across the entire manufacturing value chain‚Äîfrom R&D and operations to sales and support‚Äî‚Äîdelivering measurable business results for OEMs, Tier 1 and Tier 2 automotive and heavy engineering/manufacturing customers, as well as global supply chain and logistics companies. Our AI-powered products make advanced analytics and automation accessible and easy to use, helping organizations improve productivity, safety,and quality and reduce costs.

item.title: AIDeal - AI enabled automotive marketing intelligence from AICUE DATA LAB
item.description:
Do you want to ...

  1. Improve sales effectiveness
  2. Increase service labour and parts revenue
  3. Cut costs
  4. Reduce Inventory

  • Sales and Stock
    • Predictive reports - Custom Funnel Forecast using AI at segment and region/area level, Customers likely to buy based on AI
    • Visual reports - Daily sales against LMTD, Daily Stock
  • Service
    • Predictive reports - Customers/chassis likely to become inactive, high value jobs likely, service due
    • Visual reports - Daily Labour , parts by segment/region, Daily ROT (Repair Operation Time) and trend
  • Membership
    • Predictive reports - Customer upsell queries (for service to membership), Customers likely to buy based on AI

Sales, Service and Membership - Analytics and AI based predictive intelligence

  1. Proven solution - One of Indias large dealership for more than a year and in 2 business lines
  2. Pay as you go subscription - Large and small dealerships with no upfront investments
  3. Payback in less than 3 months[Conservative]
  4. Action oriented - Delivered at point of use(email / whatsapp and web) at cluster, region, branch or segment executive
  5. Strong user pull - 2000+ hits per week, asked not to stop despite costs in survey, 100s of quick action emails/whatsapps and proven results
  6. No retraining on IT despite older/fresh workforce, No new infrastructure (served from cloud)

item.title: AISee - Vision enabled (CCTV) AI and IOT for productivity measurement from AICUE DATA LAB
item.description:
Your AI Supervisor

... Smart, Accurate, and Tireless

An AI and IOT solution that enables you to measure productivity with just your CCTV at a low cost monthly subscription.

Productivity to Profitability...

  • Is bottleneck machine running?
  • Is operator available in all stations?
  • Is the truck parked in the dock more than 2 hours?
  • Is there clutter in the main aisles?
  • ... and many more

Continually monitor Safety...

  • How can I sustainably improve safety?
  • Are safety protocols being followed?
  • Can I measure safety compliance in real-time?
  • Can I demonstrate measurable improvement in Audit readiness?
  • ... and many more

AISee solves challenges with manual supervision...

Immediate Whatsapp Alerts for correction...Emails with charts, excel metrics for improvements

  • No need to employ an additional supervisor to monitor (night shift, etc.)
  • Consistent tracking when applied for long periods of time ‚Äì months and years, 24X7 ‚Äì No person can do it consistently
  • Macro-level trending possible, over time, or across workstations or docks and warehouses.
  • No micro-level manual errors in logging/approximation

Proven Performance ....

    Successfully tested and validated on 80 machines/areas across 7 Manufacturing Plants and 5 warehousing locations
    Received firm orders for 27 more installations from satisfied customers
    Over 24 months of seamless operation, from small shops to leading global Tier 1 manufacturing companies
    Garnering strong interest and demand from users, including supervisors/IR, who rely on our daily/weekly reports, and from owners leveraging trend reports for strategic decision-making

... Proven Results and Payback....

  • 11-15% productivity improvement for 3+ months and sustained in almost all locations!
  • Reallocation of operator manpower based on multi-manning/ Robots introduced/ teams added/shifts reduced
  • Ownership from the supervisors due to ease and utility
  • Low utilization asset identified and sold
  • Production stages reorganized

Infrastructure Required

  • CCTV (Existing with you!)
  • ... There is no second requirement ...

Pricing ....

  • Low cost monthly subscription
  • Try free for a month!
  • No upfront investments - cancel anytime
  • No reskilling
Write to us at info@aicuedatalab.com for more....

item.description:
Contact Us

Get in touch with our team to learn how AI can transform your manufacturing operations.

item.title: Privacy AICUE DATA LAB - Enabling manufacuring companies with AI for business results
item.description:
Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. It is AICUE DATA LAB Private Limited's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, http://www.aicuedatalab.com, and other sites we own and operate.

We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we‚Äôre collecting it and how it will be used.

item.title: Solutions AICUE DATA LAB - Enabling manufacuring companies with AI for business results
item.description:
Solutions covering several areas - with Domain experience

Area Experience
Design and Testing
  • Test validity - telemetry
  • Drive cycle signatures
  • Test variant optimization
Service
  • Abuse detection based on vehicle / machine telematics, Driver rating
  • Predictive maintenance
    • With Quality teams on
  • warranty analysis and prediction
  • anomaly detection
  • early warning from job card
Marketing
  • Customer segmentation and principal components
  • Product segmentation drivers and trend prediction
  • Forecasting at various aggregation levels
  • Buying/Loss propensity
  • Funnel analysis (and anomaly detection)
Manufacturing
  • Machine downtime prediction, Predictive maintenance,Abuse detection
  • In use optimization of machine setting/ parameters for operations (such as based on wear, tool / job based learning)
  • Productivity measurement for people, Yield, energy and throughput prediction (and explain-ability)
Quality
  • Poka yoke / defect detection ,Measurement with pictures / lasers
  • Pre-delivery inspection with drone / fixed cameras (No experience)
  • Test bed data - anomaly detection ,EOL testing optimization for configured products
Sourcing and Supply Chain
  • Supply chain risk (line stoppages) prediction (No experience)
  • Price discovery based on master data NLP, Automated LPP from part description for VE
  • Part description based or Geometry based search for standardization (No experience)
Support functions
  • HR Analytics and ML - Joiners and attrition prediction
  • Finance - Collection analytics
